title: [K-12] Inclusive Education Strategies in Spanish Universities: Mathematics Instructional Design for Pre-Service Teachers

context.prior_knowledge: Basic mathematical instructional competency and general educational design knowledge
context.additional_context: Limited-technology environments optimized for smartphone-based learning activities, with project-based assessments to strengthen practical competencies

learning_goals: Learners can design inclusive assessment tools that analyze math learning needs of students with diverse disabilities.
Learners can develop lesson plans applying Universal Design for Learning (UDL) principles using smartphone-based digital resources.
Learners can complete math education projects incorporating reasonable accommodations (mobility aids, alternative assessment methods, etc.).

resources: UDL (Universal Design for Learning) Guidelines Document
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
